definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

pinyin: E2 ke4 la1 he2 ma3 zhou1
E2 ke4 la1 he2 ma3 cheng2

sentences.english: I left the University of Oklahoma right before Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 我在聖誕節前夕離開俄克拉何馬大學。

sentences.english: Let me think, OK, anybody here from Oklahoma?
sentences.chinese: 讓我想想有人是來自。俄克拉何馬的嗎？

sentences.english: Karsten Creek, in Oklahoma, was another.
sentences.chinese: 卡斯滕溪在俄克拉何馬，是另一回事。

sentences.english: By the time I reach Oklahoma she'll be sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 當我抵達俄克拉何馬時，她睡了。

sentences.english: Floodwaters now cover much of the center Oklahoma.
sentences.chinese: 洪水已淹沒俄克拉何馬中心大部分地區。
